ClearFly/731/radome/animstgl/door.description: Toggle dataref for the radome door, opening(1) and closing(0).

ClearFly/731/discord_test.description: A dataref that doesn’t exist in the sim and serves for **__testing__** purposes of ***ClearBot***

ClearFly/731/walkaround/status.description: Current status of the WalkAround system(0 = off, 1 = on)
